languages.text: "Я готова исполнить приказ, однако обращаю ваше внимание, что риск, которому подвергнутся шаттлы, будет велик, и даже в случае успеха число эвакуированных будет ничтожным. Вы все еще желаете начать операцию спасения?"

"I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"
languages.original_text: "Я готова исполнить приказ, однако обращаю ваше внимание, что риск, которому подвергнутся шаттлы, будет велик, и даже в случае успеха число эвакуированных будет ничтожным. Вы все еще желаете начать операцию спасения?"

traits.locale_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

"I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

"I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

"I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

languages.text: “我随时可以执行您的命令，舰长大人，但我必须提醒您，这个决定会让我们的穿梭机面临巨大的风险。而且即使救援成功，能救下来的人数也微乎其微。您坚持要进行救援吗？”
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: “我随时可以执行您的命令，舰长大人，但我必须提醒您，这个决定会让我们的穿梭机面临巨大的风险。而且即使救援成功，能救下来的人数也微乎其微。您坚持要进行救援吗？”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、指示を果たす準備はできております。ですが、この作戦はシャトルを危険にさらすものであり、たとえ成功しても避難者の数はごくわずかです。それでも救出作戦を開始しますか？」
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、指示を果たす準備はできております。ですが、この作戦はシャトルを危険にさらすものであり、たとえ成功しても避難者の数はごくわずかです。それでも救出作戦を開始しますか？」
「ロード・キャプテン、指示を果たす準備はできております。ですが、この作戦はシャトルを危険にさらすものであり、たとえ成功しても避難者の数はごくわずかです。それでも救出作戦を開始しますか？」

languages.text: "Ich bin bereit, diesen Befehl auszuführen, Lord Captain, muss Euch aber informieren, dass die Shuttles dabei großer Gefahr ausgesetzt werden, und selbst im Erfolgsfall wird die Anzahl der Evakuierten vernachlässigbar sein. Möchtet Ihr die Rettungsoperation trotzdem durchführen?"
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin bereit, diesen Befehl auszuführen, Lord Captain, muss Euch aber informieren, dass die Shuttles dabei großer Gefahr ausgesetzt werden, und selbst im Erfolgsfall wird die Anzahl der Evakuierten vernachlässigbar sein. Möchtet Ihr die Rettungsoperation trotzdem durchführen?"

languages.text: « Loin de moi l'idée de vous contredire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je me dois de vous informer que cette manœuvre ne sera pas sans risque pour les navettes. Et même si elle est couronnée de succès, le nombre de personnes secourues sera dérisoire. Souhaitez-vous tout de même procéder aux opérations de sauvetage ? »
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: « Loin de moi l'idée de vous contredire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je me dois de vous informer que cette manœuvre ne sera pas sans risque pour les navettes. Et même si elle est couronnée de succès, le nombre de personnes secourues sera dérisoire. Souhaitez-vous tout de même procéder aux opérations de sauvetage ? »

languages.text: «Todo listo para cumplir la orden, Lord Capitán, pero debo informarle de que esta decisión supone un grave riesgo para las lanzaderas e, incluso si tiene éxito, la cantidad de evacuados será mínima. ¿Sigue queriendo llevar a cabo la operación de rescate?».
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: «Todo listo para cumplir la orden, Lord Capitán, pero debo informarle de que esta decisión supone un grave riesgo para las lanzaderas e, incluso si tiene éxito, la cantidad de evacuados será mínima. ¿Sigue queriendo llevar a cabo la operación de rescate?».

languages.text: "Emrinizi yerine getirmeye hazırım Lord Kaptan. Lakin bu eylemin mekikleri büyük risk altına sokacağını ve başarılı olsa bile tahliye edilenlerin sayısının epey düşük kalacağını belirtmeliyim. Kurtarma harekâtına onay veriyor musunuz?"
languages.original_text: "I stand ready to fulfil the order, Lord Captain, but I must inform you that this course of action places the shuttles at great risk, and even if it is successful, the number of evacuees will be negligible. Do you still wish to begin the rescue operation?"

traits.locale_text: "Emrinizi yerine getirmeye hazırım Lord Kaptan. Lakin bu eylemin mekikleri büyük risk altına sokacağını ve başarılı olsa bile tahliye edilenlerin sayısının epey düşük kalacağını belirtmeliyim. Kurtarma harekâtına onay veriyor musunuz?"
